answers.answer: Hey! I just had the same issue 2 wks ago. The one hr test came back at high (157), but my 3 hr gtt came back normal. I know it's only natural to worry, but don't. I had to tell my self that even if I had GD it's not the end of the world...it's manageable. Good luck and don't worry!

I've had gestational diabetes with all 3 of my pregnancies, this time I'm barely borderline, and its really not that big of a deal. I think the worst part is having to prick my fingers over and over again. With my first two I went to see a specialist every week after diagnosis and got to see my babies in 3D at every appointment. I was almost disappointed m
Oops! Lol! Almost disappointed that I don't get those 3Ds as I'm not having to see the specialist. Rest easy mama, don't let this worry you!
I went straight to the 3 hour test because my dad had diabetes, everyone is normal for me, good luck with your second test

How early do they do the glucose test? I know things may be different in the states than what it is here in Australia, but my doctor is doing routine tests on Wednesday (10 weeks, and he wants to make sure it's on the 10 week date) but I'm a first time mum and don't know what he's referring to..

question: Well I took my glucose test last Monday, an my sugar is above normal. She said way to high. Last week I was just drain more than ever. She next week I have to do the three hour one. So far my pregnancy had been great. No morning sickness, just nothing. My mom said my pregnancy is way to good. But now she is kind of feeling like it's good something happen. I just thought I been doing great with this being ftm.
title: feeling sad
